page.title: 10PLACES FOR KIDS IN CHARD
page.content: In Chard there are 6 play areas.In the play areas there are usually:- swings;a roundabout;a see-saw;a paddling pool; a climbing frame;tubes. These play areas have just been improved because people said there was not enough equipment so that the areas were boring.They are better now,but we don't think they are safe for children under the age of 5 by themselves. In Chard there are about 3 well known BMX tracks.The largest one is the most popular. Discoes are usually held on Fridays because that is most convenient -no school the next day!They are often held in the Guildhall. At Chard Youth Club we can play snooker;darts;computer games........
